title: (x) Karl Gerstner face - Gerstner Original {Adriano E}
author: timfm

comments.content:
Love it! Was this his only font? I can't seem to find what year he drew it.   
   
See it [here as well](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052548/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=BQ900120X1P1&start=1)...
What a great font - I might have to get that

We get to see that font here in portugal everytime we go into the highway. [Brisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052548/http:/www.brisa.pt/webnew/brisa_home.asp). Problem is that it works a lot for the logo, but not as an identity font, it rather difficult to read when you are driving fast.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052548im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42714.gif)   
I would also cut the "a" spike, this way it seems more like a recent font ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052548im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Ditto Scott -- I very well may just have to add this one to the library. It's gorgeous.
